Add Team

Team List:

ID Name Description Members Assigned projects
{{ team.id }} {{ team.name }} {{ team.description }}
{{ user.firstName }} {{ user.lastName }}
{{ project.name }}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Task } from "../model/task"; import { TaskService } from '../task.service'; import { UserService } from '../user.service'; import { User } from '../model/user'; import { Project } from '../model/project'; import { ProjectService } from '../project.service'; import { Team } from '../model/team'; import { TeamService } from '../team.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-team', templateUrl: './team.component.html', styleUrls: ['./team.component.css'] }) export class TeamComponent { teams: Team[] = []; tasks: Task[] = []; users: User[] = []; projects: Project[] = []; constructor(private teamService: TeamService, private taskService: TaskService, private userService: UserService, private projectService: ProjectService) {} ngOnInit() { this.getTeams(); this.getTasks(); this.getUsers(); this.getProjects(); } getTeams(): void { this.teams = this.teamService.getTeams(); } getTasks(): void { this.tasks = this.taskService.getTasks(); } getUsers(): void { this.users = this.userService.getUsers(); } getProjects(): void { this.projects = this.projectService.getProjects(); } addTeam(name: string, description: string, administrator?: User, members: User[], projectList: Project[]): void { name = name.trim(); description = description.trim(); if (!name || !description) { return; } this.teamService.addTeam(name, description, members, projectList); this.getTeams(); } deleteTeam(team: Team): void { this.teams = this.teams.filter(u => u !== team); this.teamService.deleteTeam(team); } }
